content: this listing is for the worry worm pattern only the pattern is written in u s terms using a 3 5mm hook will be approx 13cm high each worm is made using aran yarn & a wooden face bead these are great as bag charms or on keyrings you can sell your items made using this pattern but please give me credit for designing it this pattern and photos within belong to fiona wilkinson wilky wooly designs and cannot be sold or distributed my photos cannot be used to sell your own work other patterns are available in my ravelry store wilky wooly designs visit my facebook group wilky wooly designs to get instant updates of new & free patterns and share your finished work
